org.hibernate.type

Class AbstractCharArrayType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.type.AbstractType
      • org.hibernate.type.NullableType
        • org.hibernate.type.MutableType
          • org.hibernate.type.AbstractCharArrayType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, StringRepresentableType, Type, XmlRepresentableType
    Deprecated. 
    Use the AbstractStandardBasicType approach instead

    public abstract class AbstractCharArrayType
extends MutableType
    Logic to bind stream of char into a VARCHAR
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
